      • subscribe

        public int subscribe(JSONObject json_filter,
            java.lang.String method_callback)
        Subscribe to a filter, with a specified handler_callback, on the connected sub. The handler_callback should be a declared constant, and it should be used in the Handler of your activity!
        Parameters:
        json_filter -
        handler_callback -
